Title: Hand to God
Plot: Michael tries to find out who's the father of Maggie's baby, or if it's just another of her lies; Gob tries to find out whether he was responsible for Buster's accident.
GuestStars: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Jerry Minor, Jay Johnston, Maggie Rowe, Joe Russo, Steve Seagren, Becky Thyre, Ian Roberts
